mapper.select: SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, CASE DEPT_NO WHEN '01' THEN '인사부' WHEN '02' THEN '관리부' WHEN '03' THEN '개발부' WHEN '04' THEN '영업부' END AS DEPT_NO, CASE RANK_NO WHEN '01' THEN '사원' WHEN '02' THEN '대리' WHEN '03' THEN '과장' WHEN '04' THEN '차장' WHEN '05' THEN '부장' WHEN '06' THEN '대표' END AS RANK_NO FROM EMP
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP( EMP_ID, EMP_PASSWORD, EMP_NAME,EMP_EMAIL, DEPT_NO, RANK_NO, EMP_ADDRESS, EMP_NFC ) VALUES( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')|| CASE WHEN EMP_SEQ.NEXTVAL <10 THEN '0'||EMP_SEQ.NEXTVAL ELSE ''||EMP_SEQ.NEXTVAL END , '@'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), #{emp_name}, #{emp_email}, #{dept_no}, #{rank_no}, #{emp_address}, #{emp_nfc} )
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_PASSWORD, EMP_ID FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = (SELECT MAX(EMP_ID) FROM EMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP SET EMP_PASSWORD = #{emp_password} WHERE EMP_ID = #{emp_id}
